thread.title: Johnny Manziel Pulled Over After Fight With Girlfriend, Admitted to Drinking - KNEB-AM Scottsbluff
thread.title_full: Johnny Manziel Pulled Over After Fight With Girlfriend, Admitted to Drinking - KNEB-AM Scottsbluff - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KNEB-AM Scottsbluff
title: Johnny Manziel Pulled Over After Fight With Girlfriend, Admitted to Drinking - KNEB-AM Scottsbluff
text:
According to a four-page report obtained by ABC News affiliate WEWS-TV, Manziel and his Texas Christian University girfriend, Colleen Elizabeth Crowley, admitted to alcohol use but they were not charged. "We were aware of the situation," said Browns General Manager Ray Farmer in a statement.
 KNEB-AM Scottsbluff.
